response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that its true worth may be subjective and varies from person to person. With this in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the quality and rarity of the item. I believe it represents a significant saving compared to its market value. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
